title: Automate tax for your business
summary:
Learn how to leverage Stripe Tax to automatically calculate and collect the right amount of tax. This video will guide you through how Stripe Tax monitors tax thresholds, manages global registrations, automatically collects the right amount of tax, and simplifies filing and remitting taxes. Get started with Stripe today and make tax calculation and compliance easier.

Chapters:
00:00 Introducing Stripe Tax
00:39 Setting up your tax registrations
01:14 Managing your registrations
01:44 Calculating tax automatically
02:19 Filing with ease

Resources: 
https://docs.stripe.com/tax 
https://stripe.com/guides/tools/sales-tax-calculator 
https://stripe.com/guides/tools/vat-calculator 
https://stripe.com/guides/tools/gst-calculator 

Get started with Stripe: https://stripe.com/register
